Parameters: SSLSession: the SSLSession acting as the source of the event
String: the name to which the object is being bound or unbound

getSession().Description: Returns the SSLSession into which the listener is being bound or from which the listener is being unbound.

Returns: the name to which the object is being bound or unbound
getName().Description: Returns the name to which the object is being bound, or the name from which the object is being unbound.

ClassDesc: This event is propagated to a SSLSessionBindingListener. When a listener object is bound or unbound to an SSLSession by @B_javax#net#ssl#SSLSession#putValue_E@ or @B_javax#net#ssl#SSLSession#removeValue_E@, objects which implement the SSLSessionBindingListener will be receive an event of this type. The event's name field is the key in which the listener is being bound or unbound.
